name: Scrolly Baby
description: Bestowed upon all who enter the Scrollyverse, this badge signifies the start of your journey.

name: Scrolly Novice
description: Given to those who have taken their first steps into the wild. This badge celebrates your spirit of curiosity and your bravery to begin new adventures.

name: Scrolly Explorer
description: If you own this badge, it is because you have explored new lands and started uncovering mysteries, showing the way for others.

name: Master Mapper
description: Granted to those who have mastered navigation and started crafting their own maps, this badge recognizes individuals who meticulously chart extensive territories. Your original maps serve as essential guides for Scrollies Explorers.

name: Carto Maestro
description: This prestigious badge is for elite explorers of the Scrollyverse. You were selected from the best Master Mappers for your detailed and innovative maps, guiding countless others to explore deeper and reach further than ever before.

name: Scrolly Grand Cartographer
description: This esteemed badge is awarded to those whose cartography surpasses ordinary bounds. You are custodians of ancient knowledge, mapping undiscovered territories that few dare to explore. Their maps are sacred texts unlocking the mysteries of the Scrollyverse.
